name: Combination Game
description:
Can you find out the missing nunber in this combination game? Challenge your friends!

Each row of symbols in the matrix represents a number, and adds up across and down in a straight line. The symbols values change each round. Each symbols value will be from 1 - 10.  Find out what '?' equals.

Small app size only 14.84mb

Link for Google Play will be avaliable soon.
